explanations.reason: The paper focuses on evaluating mutual fund performance during the COVID-19 pandemic using ESG scores and data envelopment analysis (DEA) models, along with propensity score matching and logistic regression. None of the provided keywords related to machine learning, neural networks, or other advanced learning techniques are mentioned or implied in the title or abstract. The methodologies used are statistical and econometric in nature, not involving any machine learning or deep learning approaches.
